properties.description: Located between Bristen and Sedrun in the middle of alpine roses. There are many activities for families, senior citizens, climbers and winter sport enthusiasts. Up-to-date infrastructure makes courses and seminars possible. Short access trail from Maderanertal using the Alpentaxi. There is access to well-known cols to Tujetsch and to cabins in neighbouring valleys. A flying fox across Etzlibach, climbing parks and a hot water tub next to the cabin complete the cabin's attractions.
